import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import "./Style/StorePage.css"; import GAME_DATA from "./gameData"; const StorePage = ({ cartItems = [], setCartItems }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [justAdded, setJustAdded] = useState(false); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(""); const filteredGames = Object.entries(GAME_DATA).filter(([key, game]) => game.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); useEffect(() => { if (justAdded) { navigate("/cart"); setJustAdded(false); } }, [justAdded, navigate]); const handleDiscoverClick = () => { navigate("/library"); // Điều hướng đến Library }; const handleGameClick = (gameId) => { navigate(`/game/${gameId}`); }; return (
Wishlist navigate("/cart")} style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}> Cart navigate("/profile")} style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}> Profile
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} />

{filteredGames.length > 0 ? ( filteredGames.map(([key, game]) => (
handleGameClick(key)}>
